data.eml:eml: marine sediment metagenome Raw sequence reads

This dataset contains the bacterial and archaeal 16S rRNA sequence information from the Methane Microbial Observatory for Seafloor Analysis (MIMOSA) deployment at GC600 from October 2013 (PE14-09) to March 2014 (PE14-14). The purpose of the deployment was to examine the in situ degradation of oil. The deployment contained flow-through chambers of sediment, one amended with oil and one unamended. Samples were collected from the beginning and end of the experiment.
